attributes.action: protest for the UK Goverment to keep thousands of Vauxhall workers in a job.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years Vauxhalls has played a major role in the lives of workers and there surrounding communities.The workers of both plants have also played a  major role in the British motor industry which is needed for a strong economy.If the workers no had a job for Vauxhalls this would mean mass unemployment in the surrounding area.
